title: Why?
body:
why would people create a team with random people most of my posts r random crap but this one i am wondering??

i know all these people who do not know any one in there team but still want to be friends with no clue about them?

replies.body: People wouldn't just ask a completely stranger into their team, unless they know the person and acknowledge that you guys are on the same wavelength, or at least think they do.
Well you are most likely to make friends with the randoms I have 4 teams active and they were all posts on here looking for a jg so I applied and we are all pretty good friends

> [{quoted}](name=Snowdr0ppings,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=Iwtk5ERP,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-26T09:37:47.270+0000)
>
> why would people create a team with random people most of my posts r random crap but this one i am wondering??
> 
> i know all these people who do not know any one in there team but still want to be friends with no clue about them?

cause i am smart i forgot to add a pole </3

any way would u preffer to have a -

1.team of randoms you do not know that want to be in the team?

2. have a team full of people you know and are friends with?

say want you would preffer in the coments
